forgejo.description: Forgejo is a self-hosted lightweight software forge. Easy to install and low maintenance, it just does the job.

3000.description: Forgejo web UI port. Suggested default: 3000
3000.label: Web port

/data.description: Choose a Share for all forgejo data. Eg: create a Share called forgejo for this purpose.
/data.label: Data

USER_UID.label: User
USER_UID.description: User that owns the forgejo volume

USER_GID.label: Group
USER_GID.description: Group the user owning the forgejo volume is in.

APP_NAME.label: Instance name
APP_NAME.description: Name of the forgejo instance, used in the page title. Default: Forgejo: Beyond coding. We forge.

SSH_PORT.label: Exposed SSH port
SSH_PORT.description: SSH port displayed in clone URL. Default: 22

SSH_DOMAIN.label: SSH Domain
SSH_DOMAIN.description: Domain name of this server, used for the displayed clone URL in Forgejo's UI. Default: localhost

DISABLE_REGISTRATION.label: Disable registration
DISABLE_REGISTRATION.description: Disable registration, after which only admin can create accounts for users. Default: false

REQUIRE_SIGNIN_VIEW.label: Require sign in
REQUIRE_SIGNIN_VIEW.description: Enable this to force users to log in to view any page. Default: false

forgejo.more_info:
To set up, visit the web UI.

Drop-in replacement of Gitea
